creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: blue velvet skull cap with tail; gold metallic embroidery on top and tail; foliate motifs on top; floral motif on tail resembles pineapple in a pot; gold band applied around base of tail and bottom edge of hat above knit band around all edges; two buttons on tail; plain fabric lining
medium: Cotton, silk, metallic thread, mother of pearl
title: Hat
